entry.title: Madison Luxury Turkish Cotton Towel Set of 6
entry.summary:
Vendor: Classic Turkish Towels
Type: Towel Set
Price: 59.99

100% extra-long-staple cotton, highly absorbent. It is all about the fiber: only longer, stronger staple cotton fibers can be used in constructing low-twist yarns. The de-twisting action creates more air and space between the fibers, which yields a terrycloth fabric that is especially soft and spongy. This feature also decreases the time it takes the towel to dry after use or washing.
